article.headline: Miss. Valley St. 73, Southern 70
article.story: BATON ROUGE, La. (AP) -- Edward Mack hit two free throws to seal a 73-70 victory for Mississippi Valley State over Southern University on Monday night. Attarrius Norwood scored 31 points making 11-of-17 shots from the floor and 8-of-10 3-pointers to lead Mississippi Valley (17-6, 11-2 Southwestern Athletic Conference). Mack added 15 points and Hosea Butler 14. Deon Sanders led Southern (9-11, 6-7) with 24 points on 10-of-15 shooting from the floor. Jerimie Collier added 11 points and Timothy Johnson 10. The lead changed eight times and Mississippi Valley led 33-31 at the halftime. Southern outrebounded Mississippi Valley 31-29 and scored 44 points in the paint to Mississippi Valley's 26. But Mississippi Valley shot 55 percent for the game to Southern's 48 percent. Mississippi Valley also hit 12-of-22 3-pointers.
